data.text:
**Never can be sure how true this is as it is from the oh so infamous rags..

EXCLUSIVE: Sienna lashed Jude for cheating with nanny..now she's having affair

LAYER FAKE!

By Rav Singh, Dan Evans, and Sara Nuwar

SIENNA MILLER and Jude Law have sensationally split because SHE had an affair behind HIS back.

In an amazing twist, the News of the World can reveal that while Jude was begging forgiveness for bedding his children's nanny Daisy Wright, Sienna was romping with hunky actor Daniel Craig.

Last Thursday, furious Jude threw the sexy Layer Cake actress out of their £4million London home, branding her a "hypocrite and a conniving b*tch."

Now Sienna has fled to a £300-a-night hotel in Morocco.

On Saturday night Jude was spotted in southern Spain with friends after an angry confrontation with long-time pal Daniel.

Our source revealed: "Jude is incandescent with rage. He thinks Sienna's a hypocrite for giving him such a hard time over his affair when she has been carrying on with Daniel.

"To make matters worse, Daniel is one of Jude's oldest pals and he feels utterly betrayed.

"Daniel and Sienna first got together when they were filming Layer Cake two years ago, around the time Jude left his wife Sadie Frost and started dating Sienna.

"She's had Jude jumping through hoops to put their engagement on track. Now he feels badly betrayed."

http://www.newsoftheworld.co.uk/story_pages/showbiz/showbiz1.shtml

JUDE BOOTS SIENNA

October 9, 2005 -- First Jude Law cheated with the nanny, now he's reportedly dumped his fianc‚e, Sienna Miller. Britain's Sunday Mirror said yesterday that Law, whose affair with dumpling-like Daisy Wright became an international scandal, flew to a secret location and told friends not to tell Sienna where he was. "Jude has decided he and Sienna have no future and the relationship has become destructive," a source told the paper. Meanwhile, the News of the World is reporting that Law kicked Sienna out after she cheated with hunky actor Daniel Craig. Despite the extramarital fair play, Miller apparently begged Law to patch things up with her on vacation at a fancy Moroccan spa - and he even booked, cancelled and rebooked his tickets before finally bailing out.

http://www.nypost.com/gossip/29148.htm
